name: Bubble Guppies
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Preschoolers favorite little Guppies - Molly, Gil, Deema, Nonny, Oona, Goby and Bubble Puppy – make a splash in the very first Bubble Guppies videogame!



Now your child can dive into this watery world of learning and laughter with over 20 interactive activities based on Nickelodeon’s top-rated preschool series. It’s a fin-tastic adventure like no other!

Features

1) Make a splash learning with the Bubble Guppies! 2) Explore the farm, the city and more 3) Use matching skills and color recognition 4) Zoom around in the big race
